sentences.en: Alistair saw the dim figure of Rose in the chair.
sentences.cn: 阿利斯泰尔看见了坐在椅子里的罗丝的模糊身影。

sentences.en: Andrew went rigid when he saw a dog, any dog, anywhere.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁过去只要看见狗，无论在哪里，无论什么狗，都会吓得一动不动。

sentences.en: As we drew near, I saw that the boot lid was up.
sentences.cn: 我们靠近时,我看见汽车行李箱的盖子翘了起来.

sentences.en: Catherine saw to it that the information went directly to Walter.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳确保这条消息直接传达给了沃尔特。

sentences.en: He appealed for information from anyone who saw the attackers.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁任何看见袭击者的人提供信息。

sentences.en: He saw the Major's face a few inches from his own.
sentences.cn: 他看见少校的脸离他自己的只有几英寸.

sentences.en: He saw you and I.
sentences.cn: 他看见你和我了。

sentences.en: He was the fastest thing I ever saw on a baseball field.
sentences.cn: 他是我在棒球场上见过的跑得最快的家伙。

sentences.en: I didn't mean to break his nose. I just saw red.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意要打断他的鼻梁。我只是一时气急。

sentences.en: I heard them coming, crashing through the undergrowth, before I saw them.
sentences.cn: 还没看到他们，我便听到他们穿过矮树丛过来的声音。

sentences.en: I saw her in a towering rage only once.
sentences.cn: 我只有一次见过她大发雷霆。

sentences.en: I saw her push the boulder down on you.
sentences.cn: 我看见她将巨石推下砸向你。

sentences.en: I saw Louise walking slowly to the bus stop.
sentences.cn: 我看见路易丝慢慢地走向公共汽车站。

sentences.en: I saw this nice-looking man in a gray suit.
sentences.cn: 我见到过这个身着灰色套装的英俊男士。

sentences.en: I saw through your little ruse from the start.
sentences.cn: 从一开始我就看穿了你的小计谋。

sentences.en: She was in the back yard sawing logs.
sentences.cn: 她在后院锯木头。

sentences.en: The horrors I saw there ——but I dare not tell them.
sentences.cn: 我在那里看到的恐怖…但我不敢告诉他们。

sentences.en: The only tools in the house are a hammer and a saw.
sentences.cn: 屋子里仅有的工具是一把锤子和一把锯。

sentences.en: they sawed off over wages and security and concluded the deal.
sentences.cn: 他们在工资和安全保障方面各让一步，达成了交易。

sentences.en: We held on the sea for about ten days, then we saw an island.
sentences.cn: 我们在海上继续航行了约十天，最后终于看见了一座岛屿。

sentences.en: Would she know you if she saw you on the street?
sentences.cn: 如果她在大街上看到你，能认出你吗？

phrases.tran_cn: (加)（两人或多人）通过互让解决，相互妥协

trans.tran_en: a tool that you use for cutting wood. It has a flat blade with an edge cut into many V shapes.

trans.tran_cn: 看见；明白（see的过去式），锯，用锯割开
trans.tran_en: to cut something using a saw
